TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultWorkflowLoaderService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 다른 워크플로 로더 서비스가 추가되지 않은 경우 워크플로 런타임 엔진이 만든 의 기본 버전을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents the default version of created by the workflow runtime engine if no other workflow loader service is added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 클래스는 에서 파생된 다른 워크플로 로더 서비스가 서비스로 추가되지 않은 경우 런타임 엔진을 시작할 때 개체를 만듭니다.The class creates a object when the runtime engine is started, if no other workflow loader service derived from has been added as a service.
